page.title: 04Tourist Activities
page.content: people visit the area.The area does not cater for those who like like amusement arcades and slot machines but,for those who are fond of the outdoor life and the beauty of their surroundings. Tour companies organise day trips out of the area,but on days when the holidaymakers are free,they can take advantage of some of the excursions run by local boat owners from the quayside at St.Mawes.These excursions visit picturesque places along the Percuil and Fal rivers.they also cater for visitors who enjoy fishing,with short or long fishing trips in the estuaries or out at sea. {St.Mawes. This is set around a picturesque harbour with a number of shops,hotels, restaurants,pubs and cafes clustering around its edges. {PTO
